caption.title: Maximum clade credibility trees.
caption.p: SIVsm/HIV-2 loci (A) gag, (B) pol, and (C) env and SIVcpz/HIV-1 loci (D) gag, (E) pol, and (F) env are depicted. SIV lineages are blue, HIV-2 lineages are green, and HIV-1 lineages are red. Major SIVsm clades are designated by number and the HIV clades are designated by group. Nodes with posterior probability >0.9 are indicated with an asterisk.
